name: Pinnacle To Depth
description:
Humanity is sick and you've been tasked with evoking the heavenly Helix to ascend to the stars. By collecting 100 pinnacle artifacts, the Helix will open the path to godhood. However, the pinnacle artifacts have been protected by an enchanted shroud which you cannot physically pass.

You must conjure magical baubles capable of bypassing the shroud that will activate the Pinnacle artifacts when touched. Unfortunately, the artifacts float on top a layer of ice that seals away the mythical Larit Mage, an inscrutable being that will surely lay waste to all. The baubles you summon are capable of destroying the creature's icy prison, so beware.

Controls:

WASD or Left Thumbstick for strafing, forward and backwards movement.

Spacebar or gamepad bottom button to move upwards.

Left control key or gamepad right button to move downwards.

Mouse movement or right thumbstick to look around.

Right trigger, F key, or left mouse button to shoot baubles.
